metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16876 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the _keyify function in mistune.py in Mistune before 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by leveraging failure to escape the "key" argument.

criterions.comment: mistune: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
